head.title: World Briefing | Europe: Northern Ireland: Blair Cuts Vacation For Talks

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Europe: Northern Ireland: Blair Cuts Vacation For Talks

abstract.p: British Prime Minister Tony Blair cuts short vacation and returns to London day early as new escalation of political hostilities between Northern Ireland's main Protestant and Roman Catholic political parties threaten timetable for power sharing in province (S)

block.p: Prime Minister Tony Blair cut short a vacation in Miami and returned to London a day early as a new escalation of political hostilities between Northern Ireland's main Protestant and Roman Catholic political parties threatened a timetable for power sharing in the province by March 26. There was no immediate sign of a breakthrough to end the standoff.

Prime Minister Tony Blair cut short a vacation in Miami and returned to London a day early as a new escalation of political hostilities between Northern Ireland's main Protestant and Roman Catholic political parties threatened a timetable for power sharing in the province by March 26. There was no immediate sign of a breakthrough to end the standoff.
